<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summoning Handscroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=996)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society)  Remove the word "conjuration" from the summoning handscroll._

**Price** 480 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Classic summoning circles are engraved into the batons of this massive papyrus scroll.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision ([metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** If your next action is to cast a [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33) spell prepared from this spellbook that summons one or more creatures, you infuse one of the summoned creatures with the spell's energies, causing it to arrive with 10 temporary Hit Points that last for up to 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
